text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: Haaa…… Fuuuu.

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: ……this is also "flowing" isn't it?
It had been a while since I had become Neo Universe's trainer. Training was going well and there were no problems, however……

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: "Expedition" ……Neo Universe's "return", before that……

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: 『???』……there is no "indication" yet……
……it was rough. If I asked a question I would get an answer, but it took time to decipher it.
When I think about it, since I met her――

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: …………"Communication".

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: "Communication" with Neo Universe……would you like to try it? That is, if…… you're "INTI" it.
……in any case, she was a mysterious Uma Musume.
If it was something she wanted understood, I could somehow grasp the meaning. It still felt far away from the true meaning though.
It would be great if I could understand Neo Universe better……

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: ……"Observation" unfeasible.

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: You are an "Educator"……an existence known as a trainer. Someone that ensures Neo Universe will "be on track", that kind of 『person』.

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: ……is that accurate?
Rather than a question for me, it almost sounded like she was asking herself. However, I was answering the one looking directly at me.

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: However, "Observation" is unfeasible. "Dark Matter"…… an 『Unknown』, undefined.
……is she saying that she doesn't understand me?
I tilt my head, confused. Similarly, Neo Universe also tilts her head, also confused.
But, now that she's said it……right.
I had tried to understand Neo Universe but, I had never tried to have her understand me.
As if trying to search for something, Neo Universe was looking straight at me. I acknowledged her gaze, hoping that we could understand each other.
choice_data_list: It doesn't matter what it is――

text_block_list.text: I wanted her to understand. Even worries about training would be fine. If there was something she wanted to talk about, even if it was trivial, I wanted to know.
And for my part, I'd answer as many questions as she wanted. I told her that I wanted to talk a lot so we could come to a mutual understanding.

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: ……『Mutual Understanding』. To exchange "dialogue" more than now?

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: ………… So trainer "Seeks".

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: That's……Affirmative. ……『I'll look forward to it』, okay?
She looked a little bit embarrassed……was that my imagination? Maybe I would be able to understand Neo Universe much more than now.
